concept.title: Configure Article Attributes on the Answer Page

conbody.p: You can configure article attributes on the answer view page using the custom metadata attribute.

li.p: Add the custom_metadata parameter code as follows:<rn:widget path="okcs/AnswerStatus" custom_metadata="attribute | attribute | attribute"/>

Specify the attributes that you want to display as a list of items separated by the pipe character (|), for example:<rn:widget path="okcs/AnswerStatus" custom_metadata="document_id | version | status | display_date"/>
